title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it does not have any effect in the new PDF emitter.
EB: When previewing the PDF, the expected result is that the labeled item disappears. However, the actual result is that the labeled item is still visible.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application and navigate to the page where the labeled item is displayed.
2. Set the display property of the item to 'none'.
3. Preview the generated PDF.
4. Observe that the labeled item is still visible, despite the display property being set to 'none'.
